name: Stoneboard
description: Visualises Github milestones as a directed graph, columnless Kanban if you will.

REPOSITORIES.description: A list of repositories, i.e. 'org/repo,org/repo,...', to render milestones for.

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: The client ID for your Github OAuth application.

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret for your Github OAuth application.

GITHUB_HOSTNAME.description: Optional, customized Github hostname for Github Enterprise installations.
